snippet: The move is a departure for Yelp, whose main business has been selling advertising bought by local businesses with those reviews.
abstract: Yelp acquires online food-ordering start-up Eat24 for $134 million in cash and stock; acquisition marks departure for company amid slowing growth in its traditional review and advertising business.
lead_paragraph: The move is a departure for Yelp, whose main business has been selling advertising bought by local businesses with those reviews.

headline.print_headline: Yelp Pays $134 Million for Food-Ordering Service
headline.main: Yelp Pays $134 Million for Food-Ordering Service
